title: Calorie Calculator | Health and Fitness — Nutrition

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: BMI: $\\displaystyle BMI=\\frac{\\text{weight (kg)}}{\\left(\\frac{\\text{height (cm)}}{100}\\right)^2}$ Mifflin–St Jeor: $\\displaystyle BMR_{male}=10W+6.25H-5A+5 \\quad\\; BMR_{female}=10W+6.25H-5A-161$ Harris–Benedict (revised): $\\displaystyle BMR_{male}=88.362+13.397W+4.799H-5.677A$ $\\displaystyle BMR_{female}=447.593+9.247W+3.098H-4.330A$ Katch–McArdle: $\\displaystyle BMR=370+21.6\\times LBM$, where $LBM=W\\times (1-\\tfrac{BF}{100})$ TDEE: $\\displaystyle TDEE=BMR\\times PAL$ Goal target: $\\displaystyle kcal_{target}=TDEE\\times (1+\\Delta)$ where $\\Delta$ is −0.10, −0.20, −0.25, +0.10, +0.20, or 0.

sources.label: How many calories do you need?

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
